overview: Adını temize çıkaran dâhi araba tamircisi Lino'nun artık tek amacı, kardeşini ve akıl hocasını öldüren alçak polislerden intikam almaktır.
title: Lost Bullet 2

results.title: Lost Bullet
results.overview: Cinayet suçlamasıyla karşı karşıya olan eski hükümlü ve dâhi araba tamircisi, masumiyetinin delili olan tek merminin içinde olduğu kayıp bir arabayı bulmalıdır.

results.title: Meteor
results.overview: After a collision with a comet, a nearly 8km wide piece of the asteroid "Orpheus" is heading towards Earth. If it hits it will cause an incredible catastrophe which will probably extinguish mankind. To stop the meteor NASA wants to use the illegal nuclear weapon satellite "Hercules" but discovers soon that it doesn't have enough firepower. Their only chance to save the world is to join forces with the USSR who have also launched such an illegal satellite. But will both governments agree?

results.title: Kilitli
results.overview: Bekar bir anne olan Maggie, genç kızıyla birlikte bir motelde yaşar. Geçimlerini sağlamak için mücadele eden Maggie, bir depoda çalışır. Onun hayatı, iki suçlu ve patronunun karanlık bir anlaşma yaparken depoda olmasıyla kararır. Maggie’nin patronunu öldüren iki suçlu, tesisin içinde saklı olan çalıntı elmasları ararken, Maggie’yi de rehin alır. Maggie, hayatta kalmak ve kızını korumak için, suçlulardan bir adım önde hareket etmek zorundadır.

results.title: Haters
results.overview: Internet humor star Thomas the Lama gets out of hand in a video. He becomes the target of all haters and his life falls apart. To win back his girlfriend and his audience, he decides to go meet his 10 biggest detractors to see if they can say, face to face, what they write on his page - Each meeting promises to be epic.

results.title: Night of the Bloody Apes
results.overview: A surgeon transplants the heart of an ape into his ailing son with horrific results.

results.title: OMG! Oh My Girl
results.original_title: รักจังวะ..ผิดจังหวะ
results.overview: Over the years, awkward Guy keeps falling for confident June in the wrong places at the wrong times, leading him to believe fate is playing tricks on them.

results.title: Slate
results.overview: Yeon-hee always had dreams of becoming a heroine. Now in her late 20s, she is transported from a movie set to a parallel world where she gets the chance to live her dream.

results.title: Tanrı'nın Lütfu
results.overview: Noel öncesi partnerini kendisini aldatırken yakalayan Carlinhos'un imdadına yeni tanıştığı ve geleneksel ailesine kendisini yeni sevgilisi olarak tanıtacak olan Graça yetişir.

results.title: Polar
results.overview: MG, a policewoman who has been expelled from the Corps due to the problems with alcohol and drugs that she has had since the loss of her son, receives a call from a man asking her to look for Macarena Gómez, a popular TV actress.

results.title: The Zero Hour
results.overview: The Zero Hour tells the story of the La Parca (Zapata 666), a fearsome assassin who is forced to kidnap a private clinic to save the love of his life, Ladydi (Amanda Key). They soonreached the police and a media circus with them, who make our character into a national hero.La Parca finds that saving the life of Ladydi be difficult, but escaped with his followers will be an almost impossible task. Time starts to run out, and what seemed like a perfect plan will end in a frantic ending where La Parca is forced to confront past mistakes, and discover that their worst enemies are closer than he imagined.

results.title: Yakuza Prenses
results.overview: Japonya'da uluslararası suç örgütü başkanı Yakuza öldürülünce onun tek varisi olan Akemi’yi korunma amacıyla bebekken yurt dışına gönderilir. Aradan geçen yirmi yılın ardından kökenini keşfeden Akemi, zulmedenlere karşı bir savaş başlatır.

results.title: The Simpsons meet the Bocellis in “Feliz Navidad”
results.original_title: The Simpsons Meet the Bocellis in "Feliz Navidad"
results.overview: Homer bu Noel’de muhteşem bir hediyeyle Marge’a sürpriz yapıyor: İtalyan opera yıldızı Andrea Bocelli ve çocukları Matteo ve Virginia’dan unutulmaz bir performans.

results.title: A Chance To Win
results.overview: Two villages in the south of France have always been bitter rivals, but when a group of asylum seekers arrive in the community, the life of both villages is shaken up and age-old disagreements escalate. Their antagonism reaches its peak with the annual rugby derby played between the two village teams, but this time, with the new outsiders joining as unexpected recruits, the result of the 100th match will be more unpredictable than ever.

results.title: The Revenge of the Shiny Shrimps
results.overview: Two years after the death of Jean, Matthias, the coach, decides to take Selime, a young man from the suburbs he believes is gay, to accompany the Shiny Shrimps to the Gay Games in Tokyo, on a trip to pay tribute to their friend who left too early. But after they miss their connection, they find themselves stranded in Russia, in one of the not the most gay-friendly regions in the world. The start of a crazy adventure as incredible as it is perilous.

results.title: The Visitor
results.overview: After a series of tragedies including the death of his father-in-law, Robert and his wife Maia leave their home in London to move back to her childhood home. But when Robert discovers an old portrait in the attic of a man who is his spitting image, he goes down a rabbit hole to discover the identity of this mysterious doppelganger known only as the visitor. It isn’t long until he realizes – where the visitor goes, death follows.

results.title: Candy Land
results.overview: Görünüşte saf ve dindar bir genç kadın olan Remy, dini tarikatından atılır. Gidecek yeri olmadığından, kamyon durağındaki seks işçilerinin yeraltı dünyasına dalar. Remy, annelerinin ve esrarengiz bir yerel kanun adamının dikkatli gözleri altında, hayattaki gerçek amacını bulmak için gergin inanç sistemi ile kod arasında gidip gelir.

results.title: Uzun Sürücüler
results.overview: Vahşi batının efsaneleşmiş çeteleri James, Younger, Miller ve Ford biraderleri anlatan filmde tüm kardeşleri Hollywood’un kardeş aktörleri canlandırıyor. Çeteler arası hesaplaşmaları konu ediliyor.

results.title: Walter
results.overview: For Goran and his team of amateur shooters, the plan was almost perfect: to enter a hypermarket at night to rob a jeweler. But these "broken arms" had not anticipated the arrival of a vigil like no other: Walter, a former African warlord who will send them to hell .

results.title: A Christmas Story Christmas
results.overview: Ralphie is now all grown up and must deal with Christmas and all that comes with it… as a dad.

results.title: Divorce Club
results.overview: After 5 years of marriage, Ben is still madly in love. Until the day he discovers in public that his wife is cheating on him: humiliated and dumped in the process.
